did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Rose Goldsen archive of new media art.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art serves as a research repository of new media art and resources.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art serves as a research repository of new media art and resources. The curatorial vision emphasizes digital interfaces and artistic experimentation by international, independent artists. Designed as an experimental center of research and creativity, the Goldsen Archive includes materials by individual artists and collaborates on conceptual experimentation and archival strategies with international curatorial and fellowship projects.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: All the items in this guide have been cataloged individually and must be requested from their own catalog record. Many are subject to access and use restrictions due to their fragile digital states.

p.emph: This is the general collection for the Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art. To request an item from this collection please search the catalog for that item.
